website_summaries.verdict: Don't be put off by its industrial looks – this powerful fan is the best choice available today for any area you want to create significant airflow.
pros: Combines the ability to move air up to 4,000 cubic feet per min
with a 180 degree tilt to provide maximum airflow
The 24-inch design is ideal for whole-house or workshop use
cons: The low setting doesn't put out as much air as expected, but the high setting is impressive
Wobbles if not placed on a balanced surface

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your shop or garage
customer_reviews.text: For the price this product is great! It's not to loud and blows a ton of air! Had it on high 48 hours straight and it stayed put right where I put it. For the people leaving reviews of it walking my guess is they are trying to leave the wheels off. They must be on. As for a couple reviews saying its cheaply made they must be expecting a industrial grade $700 fan for this price? It's easy to roll around and comes with a nice thick cord. My only regret is waiting to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: truckzilla46

customer_reviews.title: I keep it on low 90% of the time and use high when I'm need to cool off
customer_reviews.text: On my back porch and it takes the place of 3 fans! The south is very humid this year and this is strong enough to move the air. I keep it on low 90% of the time and use high when I'm need to cool off quick
customer_reviews.author: Debbie R.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in poor condition!
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed the fan, snapped on the wheels, plugged it in, hit the power switch and.......just a humming sound. Upon closer inspection, I noticed the fan blades weren't mounted to the motor! They were loose inside the drum! I unscrewed the front wire guard and noticed bent wires, bent drum metal at the seam, and a black rub or impact mark on the bottom of the drum! Once inside the drum I was easily able to mount the fan to the motor and tighten the side screw. Once reassembled I tried again and the fan ran fine on both speeds. I'm concerned about the arrival condition. It's like the whole unit was dropped hard or involved in a wreck.
customer_reviews.author: AdamMc

customer_reviews.title: Low air flow and cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply made and it does not move near the air that is claimed. The wheels and axle just slip onto the tubing. Nothing holds them in place or on the fan. Like I said, CHEAP. The version from Chinese Tool moves more air, is better built, and the same or less money. Mine came beat up in the box as it is poorly packaged.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband, he is always working on project in the garage. Its get stuffy in there pretty quick, even with garage door and windows open. This is pretty strong. Even on low speed it circulates plenty of air. We love it. Great purchase! Will likely purchase another to gift to a relative. The only thing that was a bit annoying, item arrived with plastic wrap inside the fan wrapped around the blade. It was difficult to get around to remove. The product itself is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: WonderMommie

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: We love this fan and it will make a great addition in our garage from cooling off after mowing or while in the garage gym. It doesn't take up much space and the wheels work good. The low setting works great and the high option is just out of control awesome. All in all happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B.Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Good air movement in my garage where it is open ...
customer_reviews.text: Received today two days early. Well packaged with no flaws. Works as I expected. Good air movement in my garage where it is open on each end and it creates a good flow through. We live in Central Texas where temps hover at 100 through most of the summer. This makes it very tolerant to be in the man cave during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Stan

customer_reviews.title: Moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fan to cool my apartment off in the evenings and overnight. I also live near Seattle where the summer smoke from fires can get pretty bad. So, I place this in front of some MERV 13 furnace filters in my window and run the fan on low to bring in the cool night air. It's pretty quiet on low speed and still moves a lot of air. Works well, and along with the air filters I'm hoping to keep my apartment cool and smoke free this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Probably better to go pick this up local. Now I have to deal with boxing it back up and taking it to ups. Doesn't seem to move much air given the size.
customer_reviews.author: TYLER F. THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: I love it. working in my metal shop a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. working in my metal shop a lot of fumes and "stuff" is now pushed right out - welding with a mask and this keeps the whole house isolated. i wish i picked it up a year ago - from woodworking projects and finish/top coats to cutting metals and welding - this is the exact fan I was looking for at a competitive price -
customer_reviews.author: Thought

customer_reviews.title: Sweet fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan really moves some air. Love how small it is but also the amount of air it filters in my garage. Here's the downside to it. I turn it on either low or high and this thing squeaks! If I wanted a squeaker, I'd get one for my dog. But upon trial and error, I put the fan halfway on a bag of cat litter and to my surprise the squeaking stopped.... How odd is that? Here's the edit after using the fan for quite a few hours. No more squeaking at all. Moves so much air in my garage, I thoroughly enjoy using it and hope to use it for many more years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Chris.Burke1

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fan for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice big fan. Yes, it's more expensive than the $30 fans, but it moves a lot more air, Very simple to assemble. Wheel kit just snaps on. Nice long cord. Two speed fan, lots of air, and even more air. I wouldn't call it quiet, but not unreasonable for the air it's moving. Fan's light enough you don't really need wheels, OK. nice handle for carrying and moving. Fan tilts up and down to direct the air where you want it. Happy customer. I work in my garage in Florida, where the temperature is often 90 degrees. This helps a lot. I liked it so much I bought another for my small warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Texas Garage Gym
customer_reviews.text: I have used this fan for several months now in my garage gym and it makes a ton of difference! My garage is not climate controlled so it gets pretty hot in the Texas summers. This fan can really move some air around the garage and can be easily positioned for optimal use. I like that it has a handle and wheels because I move it depending on what I am doing in the gym. I like this fan so much that I am considering getting a second one. It can be a bit loud on high, but that is because it is REALLY pushing air flow. I would totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: Quietest fan ever
customer_reviews.text: Looked damage free and packaging was in good shape. Plugged in, turned on and nothing happened. A big red floor ornament. Now I have to return it for another. If this one doesn’t work I’m done with Max Air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Went bad in 5 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my garage, upon using it for 5 months the fan stop working. I tried to look for a warranty I could not find it anywhere on this page. Please help how can I claim the warranty and get it fixed or replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Payal Kumari

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in pieces due to poor workmanship. There was no damage to shipping container yet the fan blade was off the motor damaging the blade and housing. When attempting to reassemble vibrated horribly due to being out of balance
customer_reviews.author: MetalHead

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for the money
customer_reviews.text: We received this fan in a timely fashion, When plugged in I quickly realized the blades seem to be ou-of-balance. In low speed, the fan has a slight shimmy. In high speed, the fan seems to smooth out. We used it at a family gathering. At slow speed to fan pushed good air and was not too loud over the voices of the family. At high speed the sound was intrusive...
customer_reviews.author: WilsonB

customer_reviews.title: One fan made a huge difference on the dock
customer_reviews.text: I work on the dock for a major retailer and their is no circulation back there. This fan made a huge difference for every member of our team and I was a hero for thinking of it. In the cooler seasons I bring music for the associates to listen to but when the fan is running it's too loud to hear the music but that's a small price to pay for no longer feeling like you're going to pass out from heat exhaustion.
customer_reviews.author: oddlittleducks

customer_reviews.title: Great warrantee but lousy shipping quality control
customer_reviews.text: Great warrantee but lousy package delivery. The first fan blade component was bent causing the fan assembly to vibrate and noisily walk across the floor. They sent a warrantee entire replacement fan assembly that had missing parts unrelated to the bent fanblade component. I had to canabalize the first fan assembly of necessary parts to get a complete operable fan unit. I have had quieter fans but decided to accept this one product because the company appeared to go extremes to satisfy. The fan units are not cheaply made but the shipping quality control definitly is. The maufacture did not want the assembly with the bent fan blade component returned.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ward

customer_reviews.title: this is a great disappointment. Oh
customer_reviews.text: no where close the advertised volume of air being moved. Unless I just happened to get a dud, this is a great disappointment. Oh, it was also missing the axle for the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: RLD61

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for work and for the fact is was made in the USA. Quality is okay, but apparently they don't test them before they get boxed. This thing is so out of balance that if its not corrected, its going to vibrate itself to pieces. For the cost, I thought I was buying a quality product...just not the case. I'm going to take it apart and try to balance the blade and straighten it out. Either that or call the company direct and see if they will stand behind their product..
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery A Smith

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fan shakes SO much. Not the quality I hoped for. Update: a year later, the fan still works, but it’s GARBAGE. Shakes so much that it inches across the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Garage Gym :)
customer_reviews.text: It is a little loud but we use it in our home gym, which is in our garage and it is perfect. Easy to move around and angle. Quick to set up. It has 2 speed settings and the output of air is strong. I would absolutely buy this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Hess

customer_reviews.title: Great airflow for a 2-car garage.
customer_reviews.text: Used in a 2-car garage converted-to gym. The fan arrived with no damage. The only setup required was attaching the wheel axle. This replaced a 16-inch fan and with that fan I had to keep the garage doors closed to keep the hot air out. With this fan, I ran it on low with the garage open, and there was comfortable airflow throughout. I left it on the majority of the day and it was stable. The noise level was expected for a drum fan. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ForWheels

customer_reviews.title: Even better than pictured
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, powerful, perfect for the patio to keep cool and (hopefully) deter mosquitos. It’s “industrial”, but not to be left outside, as it’s electric and that doesn’t mix with rain. (Saw some confusion in other comments). Noise level is tolerable, I can’t imagine how something that blows that much air could be totally quiet. Great value and comes assembled. No complains at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Strong fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan works better than a larger more expensive warehouse fan. Also, you can tell the difference between low and high. Low is almost quiet and High is the kind of noisy you expect from something moving this much air. Worth the $$$.
customer_reviews.author: CA Cycleworks

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our garage because we set up a workout area in there. It really helps! Before we got it, I refused to go out there to exercise because it was so hot.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: 3 speed would be an improvement otherwise a good fan.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for some air circulation in my shop. its been on 24/7 since I got it. works very well. I would have given it 4.5 stars if I could have simply because you have low or high. it would be better if it had a medium setting. because high is gale force winds and low is just a little too low.
customer_reviews.author: cforcht

customer_reviews.title: Vibrating
customer_reviews.text: Moves a lot of air but has an awful vibration, I have to put a sandbag on he stand to hold it in place. Can’t recommend for this reason
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M.

customer_reviews.title: Loud, OK fan, not mind blowing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my screened in porch. On high- 8 ft from the fan there isn’t that much air... if you sit right in front of it you can get a good amount of air. LOUD!!!! Not that impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Stranz

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: This fan is not recommended for outdoor use---so where do I use it? On my deck. This is one powerful, loud fan. Not to be used in your living room mind you but use it in the correct setting, it's great. A shop, deck (don't leave it out when not in use. Must be kept dry).
customer_reviews.author: bobc4242

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan But Complicated Being Honest
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. Even on low, it moves a lot of air. Was funny, we bought one but they shipped two by mistake. As awesome as Amazon is on normal returns, it was complicated being honest and tell them they made a mistake. We did not keep the original packaging as my husband thought I had ordered two. They finally gave us a reasonable discount to keep it. Guess they are not used to honest people. The manager I talked to said “this has never happened before so bare with me....”.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This fan is great! Ordered for a bday gift for my husband. We live in Texas and summer time is a killer. This fan really moves some air! It's as noisy as a shop fan is expected to be, idk why people say its so noisy. Very pleased with this fan
customer_reviews.author: MNP

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: Hull and back grille were crumpled inwards, apparently dropped from a high place. One of the threaded bolts keeping the motor secured to the back grille was heavily bent and snapped when I tried to remove it. Had to pound the hull back into something of a normal shape to keep the blades from scraping against it while powered on. It works alright when the thing is actually in shape, but where the hell is the quality-assurance for these things?
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality & poor shipping
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the original that quit working. It arrived damaged & I will be sending it back also. Been "out of town" doing FEMA relief for Hurricanes Irma & Maria.....I will be calling when I get back stateside.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Corson

customer_reviews.title: Moves some serious air.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a really strong fan for our home gym which is basically a semi insulated garage. This fan really moves the air around. I cannot imagine ever needing the higher speed. That felt like a hurricane. Also, it is a nice looking unit.
customer_reviews.author: Occy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t jump to conclusions to quick,be patient.
customer_reviews.text: After ordering I noticed it was smaller than I thought,wanted 36” and it was 26”.Tried to cancel it Monday morning but already had been pulled for shipping.I was informed I could return but would have to pay for return shipping.When I recieved and opened it found we found it to be plenty large enough for our use,notified them we were keeping it,they was fine with that ,it was an excellent buy so everything worked out fine for both of us.They was great to work with and very cooperative. ——. Ronl
customer_reviews.author: Ron l

customer_reviews.title: Little Hurricane
customer_reviews.text: Thing is a badass for its size it moves some area differently will be buying another one soon
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Fan is good but doesn't seem to move as much air as I had expected
customer_reviews.text: 4 fan blades does make for an efficient system but the air flow when on low is a bit to be desired. Fan Blade pitch is less than I would expect for a fan this size. roller wheels provided are a bit useless as they are clip on rather than secured. always pop off when I tried to move the fan with them in place.
customer_reviews.author: daniel kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Great wind output
customer_reviews.text: Puts off some serious air even in low setting. Love the wheels for easy moving. The holes in the fan are small enough that my kids won’t get their fingers in it. Way better quality for the money than some chain stores options.
customer_reviews.author: HaydenMom18

customer_reviews.title: Wind generator, 2 speed
customer_reviews.text: Anti-skeeter windstorm device works great at 10 foot to 30 foot ranges by hi/lo speed selector, even in Floridaworld. Not to be stored outdoors without a proper VINYL upright BBQ cover, since rain is it's enemy.
customer_reviews.author: BAT guy

customer_reviews.title: You’ll be happy!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this little unit. it moves almost as much air is my 42 inch MAXX AIR unit. There was no damage to the package. The paint job was high-quality. It is very quiet. It has been running on high since the day I bought it, and I see no evidence of it wanting to quit.
customer_reviews.author: Neuroblade

customer_reviews.title: Great low noise high volume fan
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from warehouse deals....so happy with this fan. Yes...it was banged up a little but everything was there and it works great. I can actually hear the radio playing now with this fan on. Had a HF 30" floor fan before and it was very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Some defects
customer_reviews.text: Missing bolts. Did not have full punches, I needed to drill them for the bolt to fit. Very frustrating. If my husband didn't have these tools I would have had to return...... and try to get all the parts back in the box.......a challenge!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: It can handle humid Alabama summers, it can handle anything
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, cools me off when its 105 degrees in Alabama. It moves so much air. Priced well and is well built. It would be perfect if the on/off high/low switch were larger and could be read from above, since the fan will usually be on the ground below you. Also if the cord transported better, like a groove and clip to tuck away the cord when you are moving or putting away the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Great fan for our home gym!
customer_reviews.text: We have a home gym in our garage and this fan is perfect to keep the air moving so we can still workout (powerlifting, kettlebells, dumbbells, yoga, etc) even in this hot humid summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: AAdamson

customer_reviews.title: Boxing poor be ready to send back or be willing to work to have a working fan.
customer_reviews.text: When I received the fan it had a bent blade and bent body for the outer fan. After some work and been willing to keep a damaged product because I needed the fan. It works after the overhaul.
customer_reviews.author: Harris

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fan for my son's automotive shop that just opened. He sweats easily when working anyway and the last couple of weeks the temperature has been HOT! Upon arrival of this fan, all he could say was how impressive it was! The fan is nice looking and well-built. On the high setting, if it ain't fastened down, it will blow away. If my son can be happy with this fan, then I highly recommend it to anyone that needs a serious fan!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL!
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave it outside as it says indoor use only. I do use out on patio when I'm there. The 24/7 smokers in rental house next door no longer have any chance at stinking up my beautiful, chill-vibe patio with their insidious second-hand smoke. Buh-bye, Stinky.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great fan. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan. I don’t understand the negative reviews about dents and blades not working. It appears to be brand new and we love that it effectively cools a large room without AC. We’ve had it one day and actually already used it to dry our basement floor and it took no time at all. I may purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: LoRye

customer_reviews.title: Best fan
customer_reviews.text: MazzAir makes great industrial fans and are worth every penny. They never fail in tough situations and are very durable. Love the new wheel feature in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Rey G.

customer_reviews.title: how well it works
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to use under our pavilion at lake lot . really made it a lot more comfortable on hot days . pretty minimal noise level . used to use 3 fans , now only this , and much less noise and so much more comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Old School

customer_reviews.title: Quality fan
customer_reviews.text: Fan works well. If you had to roll it around everyday, the tires may not hold up over time. It sits in our barn and keeps the livestock cool. The high setting is a lot of wind. The low setting is fine for livestock.
customer_reviews.author: MRF

customer_reviews.title: Big, relatively quiet, well made and sets up in several minutes
customer_reviews.text: I need a big fan to help cool my attic during the long summers in Alabama. I bought a cheaper one that was a piece on junk on Amazon and saw this one at Home Depot. The lady in the garden department said she had been using it full blast for a year, and it was great so I ordered it from Amazon .
customer_reviews.author: Richard D.

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good quility fan other than that
customer_reviews.text: Well To start I tried reaching out to the sellers numous times to see I could get a replacement fan or to get the one i bought fixed. The fan i received will only work on the High setting and not on the low setting. Seems to be a good quility fan other than that. (eyes rolling).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. We use it during our workout we do in our garage. Its not too loud at all. Blows lots of air.
customer_reviews.author: jess c.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: This is a Fantastic addition to my Garage Home Gym!!! It's loud but definitely gets the job done. A Great buy and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NappturalCutie

customer_reviews.title: Its hard to find a good fan, but I'm glad I found these.
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted to take a moment to give this fan a big thumbs up. I've seen some complaints, but I ordered two of these and run them 24-7 on low without problem. Its hard to find a good fan, but I'm glad I found these.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for noise because it’s definitely loud, but I figured it would be and it doesn’t bother which is why I still give 5 starts overall. It’s definitely sturdy and puts out a lot of air when on high.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne M Self

customer_reviews.title: This fan makes alot of banging noises
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my garage to help move air. It has a great motor but it has a clanking sound when running on low its tolerable with some adjusting but on high forget about it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Richey

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our barn. It was purchased in July and has died already. We use it lightly just during part of the day. Terrible and it is not returnable per Amazon!! Don't bother with this MAX AIR. Or go elsewhere where you can return a defective product. It should not stop working within 10 weeks of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Strong flow but comes with noise - I guess it's a trade-off. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Kikky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan.
customer_reviews.text: Very well balanced and puts out a lot of air. We've had some of these at work for as long as I've been there and they are definitely abused and continue to function properly. I take much better care of my personal stuff so I expect this fan will last me decades to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Tecsun

customer_reviews.title: Right Fan, Wrong Color
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice fan; however, I ordered red and received a yellow...
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Best price
customer_reviews.text: This is the best priced fan I found. Our horses love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rev Steve

customer_reviews.title: Did not last long at all!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this fan to circulate air in warehouse. Bought it in January 2019, quit working June 2019. I could smell the motor, and the fan stopped turning. I thought it was a good buy at the time but when something only works for 6 months, I guess it wasn't a good purchase after all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT work out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Did not wit out of the box. Also drum had minor dents. The dents did not hinder the motor. I purchased this for my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good fan for the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a good powerful fan. We have used it for almost a year now, It is still blowing. On high speed it, it moves on a flat smooth concrete surface. It vibrates. I put some weight, chair, or something else on the bottom to keep it in place. It is good but be prepared to hold it in place somehow when it is on high speed.
customer_reviews.author: JJD

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take camping and finally got to use for the Memorial Day weekend... worked great! It is a little loud, but goodness the ‘low’ setting is plenty of air moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beats big-box store prices
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this fan can't be beat. It blasts air at very high velocity, and cools an entire row of our warehouse with ease. The breeze can be felt 30 feet away with no trouble. We'll be buying another one next summer!
customer_reviews.author: RavenR1

customer_reviews.title: Great wind output!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the patio. A little noisy, but does the job!😊
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: RELIEF FROM THE SO TEXAS HEAT
customer_reviews.text: Using this fan for moving air in the attic of my South Texas home where the A/C condenser units are located. The heat reduction and circulation capability of this unit is above expectation. It stays on 24/7, and is quiet enough to not be annoying for everyday living. MUCH less expensive than heat extractor solutions, and far better than doing nothing in the attic during the hot summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Schmedes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fan!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and powerful fan! So easy to put wheels on, and then it’s ready to go
customer_reviews.author: Dr Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Blow me!
customer_reviews.text: It moves some air, but needed some adjustments to not rub. It rattles and shakes but great for the garage.
customer_reviews.author: RonR

customer_reviews.title: Works good In the barn.
customer_reviews.text: Good fan moves a lot of air, not quiet though. I do wish it had a medium speed, it has only hi and low.
customer_reviews.author: M Meoak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We are extremely happy with this fan. We bought it for when we are hanging outside. It blows hard and doesn't move at all. The only downfall is that the wheels keep falling off when I bump something but that can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Nanner

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy but lots of air
customer_reviews.text: I love the amount of air it pushes but it shakes a lot (even on low) and constantly makes a very irritating squealing noise.
customer_reviews.author: tara thorsten

customer_reviews.title: very good!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product and it arrived super fast! I made a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dionathan e Thalita

customer_reviews.title: It moves air
customer_reviews.text: Does shake on hi if the wheels are too far in. Clip on wheels are adjustable. Hi and low are far apart. Medium would make this fan better.
customer_reviews.author: Prince Charming

customer_reviews.title: Turn it on moves a lot of air.
customer_reviews.text: Garage air flow I like it but the fan blade needs balanced better.
customer_reviews.author: stanley stricker

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Fan works perfect. Moves the air very well.I am very pleased as it is pretty quiet.. The only reason I cannot give it 5 stars is because the box was missing the wheels as shown in the picture and description.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Garoutte

customer_reviews.title: Our children show livestock with 4H and we purchased fan to help keep animals cool in this awful South Georgia
customer_reviews.text: This fan was worth every penny! Our children show livestock with 4H and we purchased fan to help keep animals cool in this awful South Georgia hear
customer_reviews.author: Allison Kelley

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Couldnt ask for much more. Bought 2 1 for an intake one for an exhaust at a treatment plant I run. Plant dried out over night. There small enough that I'll be able to move em around in the winter for better air and heat movement. Time will tell if they will last
customer_reviews.author: edward nelson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan
customer_reviews.text: Fan is ready to go right out of the box. Wheels axle is pre-assembled and snaps to frame. Easy to move from location to location. Has a high and low speed (low speed is plenty of air flow). Use it on our deck and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Penny

customer_reviews.title: Home Depot had similar fan for 129.00
customer_reviews.text: Fan works well but Home Depot had similar fan for 129.00 saw after I bought this one
customer_reviews.author: Tom Marra

customer_reviews.title: Great quality build and moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and high quality especially for it's price range. My boss wanted to get one from Costco but glad I went with this one!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: great fan moves lots of air!
customer_reviews.text: great product moves lots of air. product arrived damaged but was easily repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: lasted less than 3 months and quit working. Used it 5 days a week in my garage couple hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Dandrprotools

customer_reviews.title: Got a whole 2 months of use...
customer_reviews.text: Started out well, noise level wasn’t bad. We had it in the barn. We bought it the beginning of June and by August 11 the motor burned out. Have tried contacting seller as well as the company that makes the MAXXFAN, and nothing. So paid 150.00 for 2 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Clark

customer_reviews.title: Needs more speed options
customer_reviews.text: Moves a lot of air...bit only 2 speed options, one being pretty low and the other is all out.... if I had it to do over again I would choose a model with with more than 2 speeds
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan my family keeps trying to get it from me you sit poolside at my cousin's awesome used it Fourth of July in the garage kept everybody cool and get the mosquitoes down highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent product but shipping packaging horrible case and drive shaft
customer_reviews.text: Damaged, packaging awefull. Decent product but shipping packaging horrible case and drive shaft bent
customer_reviews.author: Shocking

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Fan of this!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fan. Keeps the garage cooled down. Well as much as blowing around 90 degree air can do. Well built. The tilt feature helps in directing the air flow. The wheels snap on but seem to hold up well. Makes moving the fan and repositioning very easy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Adee

customer_reviews.title: Great shop fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my work to put in the shop since it gets hot with the A/C cutting in and in the summer. This fan is really powerful it's great that it's on wheels so it can move easily. I'm extremely pleased with this.
customer_reviews.author: Breanne

customer_reviews.title: Works great and moves a lot of air
customer_reviews.text: Works great and moves a lot of air. Is much quieter on low but moves an unbelievable amount of air on high
customer_reviews.author: Aaron H.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan with small footprint for storage
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fan for the garage, patio or shop. Circulates air well. Low speed has a low to moderate noise level compared to high speed, which certainly lets you know that it is pushing a lot of air.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Miranda

customer_reviews.title: great fan
customer_reviews.text: use it all the time on the farm. came with a dent in the side however i didn't have to pay extra for it so no problem
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Horton

customer_reviews.title: Powerful...
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful.. It’s everything I expected and the right size.. Easy hook

customer_reviews.title: Max-Air
customer_reviews.text: Fan is great very powerful it is the best buy i have done lately.
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Max Air Fan
customer_reviews.text: Received the Max Air Fan 2 days ahead of scheduled delivery time!!!! The fan was packaged very well. The fan works as described...plenty of power with the 1/4 HP motor. Will know next summer how much better my work shop will be with this fan! Hi & Low speed is very sufficient!!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

product_meta.title: Maxx Air | Industrial Grade Air Circulator for Garage, Shop, Patio, Barn Use | 24-Inch High Velocity Drum Fan, Two-Speed
product_meta.description: Color:YellowThis 18-inch wall mount fan is a great choice for barns, workshops or garages. This fan can be wall-mounted or a hanging fan where floor space is limited, when overhead circulation is required and for harsh indoor environments. It features totally enclosed, dust proof, energy efficient PSC motor - 120 volt, 60Hz and 0.7 Amps. It has a 3-speed pull chain, rugged hanging bar and the fan head tilts 180 degrees. It is made of powder-coated steel, OSHA compliant rust resistant grilles and a 10-foot cord. Installing this MaxxAir HVWM18UPS High Velocity 18 inch Wall Mount Fan is easy. Along with the 18" fan head that tilts 180 degrees, this purchase includes a rugged hanging bar for quick setup and near immediate use.
feature_bullets: EXTREME OUTPUT - This is not your typical cheap fan. Made from rugged steel and built to last, this industrial grade mount fan is good for the toughest conditions and the most discerning consumer.
TILT / 2 SPEED - Tiliting head and 2 speed functionality, and with new frustration free packaging you will be using your new fan as quick as you can open the box.

RUGGED - Powder coated steel construction, premium motors, and premium quality. We don't know if you're using this in a factory or industrial setting, or just cooling off a patio, shop, or garage, but we made sure to build a product that could handle both with ease.
IDEAL FOR USE - Shops, garages, patios, barns, gyms, basements, workshops, commercial settings, industrial settings, factor floors, anywhere air movement is needed.
SAFETY FIRST - OSHA compliant grills, 10 foot grounded power cords, 180 degree tilt capability.
